gameDetails.description:
Enough staring at the empty horizon! No ship will ever reach here! It's time to quit living on illusory hopes. Damn spyglass!

With Robinson Crusoe: Adventure on the Cursed Island – Spyglass of Illusory Hope, you can break the spyglass in half to get five Determination tokens.
